install

Manga Kingdom is a app for reading comics books. It provides users with a quick way to read comics. Manga Kingdom uses a new product design to make it more consistent with users' habits.

HUGE DATABASE

Comics contains thousands of manga, different genres, such as action, adventure, comedy, romance, etc.

AUTO UPDATE

Auto update new mangas and new chapters.

【Detail and sell way】

All comics books are English as language.reading book will be charged for fee，when you pay the fee in the app, you can read book propitious without charging any other fee.We sell them by per chapter not for membership.we will not charge register fee

【Product Purchase flow】

the buy way is register in app，and select one chapter you want.after pay for it in app,you can scan this chapter

【Book Price】

All book are sold in rupee. Our book cost 10₹ for one chapter.The more chapter one book, the more expensive the total price.when you read charged chapter you need pay 10₹ to unlock one new chapter，so In one book the font chapter is free and the latter is charged.

【Product catalog】

Our Ebook sac code is 997319.We have action ,comedy,adventure,school life,shounen,All regions follow the rules which is charged by chapter.

If you need a refund, please add customer service in contact us
